feed.title: Speaches Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for Speaches: v0.6.0
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Project renamed from faster-whisper-server to speaches :peach:
  • Text-to-Speech support :speaking_head:
  • OpenAI-compatible API
  • Two models are supported: Piper(x86_64 only) and Kokoro
  • Added GradioUI for audio generation
  • Published documentation website :book:
  • Switched from Docker Hub to GitHub Container Registry
  • Other minor things...

Full Changelog: https://github.com/speaches-ai/speaches/compare/v0.5.0...v0.6.0

entry.title: New release for Speaches: v0.7.0
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • refactor/split gradio ui by @fedirz in https://github.com/speaches-ai/speaches/pull/279
  • fix: no cuda for macos by @xbattlax in https://github.com/speaches-ai/speaches/pull/278
  • feat/audio chat 231 by @fedirz in https://github.com/speaches-ai/speaches/pull/280
  • deps: update kokoro-onnx by @fedirz in https://github.com/speaches-ai/speaches/pull/281
  • feat: add cuda 12.4.1 support by @fedirz in https://github.com/speaches-ai/speaches/pull/282
  • misc deps changes by @fedirz in https://github.com/speaches-ai/speaches/pull/292
  • docs/voice chat by @fedirz in https://github.com/speaches-ai/speaches/pull/296

Full Changelog: https://github.com/speaches-ai/speaches/compare/v0.6.2...v0.7.0
